thread.title: Tosin Abasi Presents New Signature Pickups: It Always Sounds Like You've Got Fresh Strings On [News]
thread.title_full: Tosin Abasi Presents New Signature Pickups: It Always Sounds Like You've Got Fresh Strings On [News]

title: Tosin Abasi Presents New Signature Pickups: It Always Sounds Like You've Got Fresh Strings On [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted a day ago 4 Animals as Leaders guitar champ Tosin Abasi has joined the Fishman family with a set of signature Fluence active pickups.As you may or may not know, Tosin describes himself as a "lover of passive pickups," making the transition a bit surprising.Mr. Abasi noted he was blown away by the Fluence series from the first time he tried it, as the pickups proved superior to a set of humbuckers he previously developed to match his ideal taste.The musician said about the pickups - which come in 6-, 7-, and 8-string packs: "The low-end string quality is literally uncanny. That type of clarity usually comes at the sacrifice of something else, but these things are incredibly balanced throughout the frequencies of the guitar."For the cleans - it sounds like you've got the freshest pair of strings out there."You can check out the whole clip below.
